sentences.en: "He gave me a hug and a kiss and asked me where my snowman was," she said.
sentences.cn: 黛比说：“他给了我一个拥抱和亲吻。 还问我的雪人在哪里。”

sentences.en: A snowman in one of the movies even looks like Burl lves.
sentences.cn: 其中一部电影里的雪人甚至长得很像伯尔·艾夫斯.

sentences.en: Because I like to play in the snow and make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 因为我喜欢在雪地里玩耍和堆雪人.

sentences.en: Do you know what a snowman is, Li Ming?
sentences.cn: 李明,你知道雪人是什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: During the winter holiday, my friends and I a snowman together.
sentences.cn: 在寒假的时候, 我和我的朋友一起堆雪人.

sentences.en: If you are wrong,the snowman with the correct answer will chill your heart.
sentences.cn: 如果你是错误的，有正确答案的雪人将会使你的心脏变冷。

sentences.en: It was so cold that the snowman bought a house.
sentences.cn: 注:连雪人都冷得受不了了,都买房子了.

sentences.en: It'snows in winter so I can make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 冬天下雪,所以我可以堆雪人.

sentences.en: Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer, and Frosty the Snowman.
sentences.cn: 《红鼻子驯鹿鲁道夫》和《结霜的雪人》.

sentences.en: Snowman is very cute, the people see that we are praised.
sentences.cn: 雪人很可爱, 大人们看见了都夸奖了我们.

sentences.en: The boy is building a snowman.
The children are making a snowman.
sentences.cn: “孩子们正在堆雪人”的英语是?

sentences.en: The children were balling up snow to make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在把雪堆成球状，做一个雪人。

sentences.en: Then we could have a snow fight make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 如果下雪我们就可以堆雪人,打雪仗.

sentences.en: We can climb hills in fall. We can a snowman in winter.
sentences.cn: 在秋天,我们可以爬山. 在冬天,我们可以堆雪人.

sentences.en: We can make a snowman on a snowy day.
sentences.cn: 在下雪天,我们可以堆雪人.

sentences.en: We went to build a snowman but before it was half finished I was chilled to the bone.
sentences.cn: 我们去堆雪人,但还未堆完一半时,我已感到寒气刺骨了.

trans.tran_en: a simple figure of a person made of snow, made especially by children
a simple figure of a person made of snow, made especially by children
